abstract: This weekend, thousands of Americans will cobble together Halloween costumes with Wall Street themes. DealBook is here to help.
snippet: This weekend, thousands of Americans will cobble together Halloween costumes with Wall Street themes. DealBook is here to help.
lead_paragraph: This weekend, thousands of Americans will cobble together Wall Street-themed costumes in preparation for Halloween. (Pre-emptive note: dressing in a suit and tie and labeling yourself "The One Percent" is not as clever as you think.)

headline.main: Trick or Treat, Wall Street Style
